title: Close Remembrance
description: This is a previously-published edition - ASIN: B00EYGBD4SThe stunning conclusion to the critically acclaimed series that has won thousands of fans!When a ruthless enemy finally strikes, Mia and Korum will face the biggest test of their relationship yet. But it’s Korum’s own secrets that may ultimately tear them apart.From the beaches of Costa Rica to a planet in a distant galaxy, theirs is a love story that may change the world . . .Warning: This book contains strong sexual content and explicit language and is not suitable for readers under 18.
author: Anna Zaires
